name: timur-eslint-config
description: My personal opinionated preference eslint config that can be written into any project with a simple command. prettier-eslint-cli is also installed as a dev dependency

scripts.patch: npm run git-patch && npm run npm-patch
scripts.git-patch: git add . && git commit -m "patch" && git push

author: Timur Uzel <timurt.uzel@gmail.com> (https://github.com/timurtu)
